rights.description: Custodian must respond within 5 business days by furnishing copies, advising time/place for inspection, or denying in writing with specific reasons
rights.conditions: No exceptions - hard 5 business day deadline
rights.implementation_notes: One of the fastest mandatory response times in the nation
rights.request_tips: Track submission date - agency must respond within 5 business days or is in violation

rights.description: Public body may NOT charge search or retrieval fee
rights.implementation_notes: UNIQUE: West Virginia is one of few states that completely prohibits search fees
rights.request_tips: If charged search/retrieval fees, cite absolute prohibition in statute - only reproduction costs allowed

rights.description: May charge reasonable fees for reproduction not to exceed actual cost
rights.conditions: Fees cannot exceed actual reproduction cost
rights.implementation_notes: Only actual, direct reproduction costs permitted - no markup or overhead
rights.request_tips: Challenge any fees exceeding actual reproduction cost; request itemized invoice

rights.description: Court may award reasonable attorney fees and costs to substantially prevailing petitioner
rights.conditions: Must substantially prevail in mandamus action
rights.implementation_notes: Creates strong disincentive for unlawful denials
rights.request_tips: If considering litigation, attorney fees are recoverable if you substantially prevail

rights.description: Mandamus proceedings given priority on circuit court calendar
rights.conditions: Applies to all FOIA mandamus cases
rights.implementation_notes: Ensures faster judicial resolution than typical civil cases
rights.request_tips: FOIA cases receive expedited treatment - not subject to normal court delays

rights.description: Willful violation may result in removal from office
rights.applies_to: Public officials who willfully violate FOIA
rights.implementation_notes: Strongest possible penalty - creates powerful deterrent
rights.request_tips: If denial appears willful and intentional, this penalty may apply to responsible official

rights.description: Criminal penalties apply for willful destruction of public records
rights.applies_to: Public officials who willfully destroy records
rights.implementation_notes: Protects records from intentional destruction to avoid disclosure
rights.request_tips: If records destroyed after request, criminal penalties may apply

rights.description: No identification or purpose statement required; may be oral or written (written recommended)
rights.conditions: Must state with reasonable specificity the information sought
rights.implementation_notes: Oral requests accepted but written recommended for documentation
rights.request_tips: You do not need to identify yourself or explain why you want records

rights.description: All FOIA requests must be reported to Secretary of State for publicly accessible database (since 2016)
rights.implementation_notes: UNIQUE: Creates transparency about FOIA usage and agency responsiveness; searchable at erls.wvsos.gov/FOIA_Database/Search
rights.request_tips: Search Secretary of State FOIA database to see how your agency has responded to similar requests

rights.description: Provisions shall be liberally construed with view of carrying out public policy declaration
rights.implementation_notes: Creates strong presumption in favor of disclosure
rights.request_tips: Cite liberal construction mandate when challenging restrictive agency interpretations

rights.description: Custodian must furnish proper and reasonable opportunities for inspection during business hours
rights.conditions: Must be during regular business hours
rights.request_tips: Request in-person inspection to avoid reproduction fees entirely (search fees already prohibited)

rights.conditions: Agency discretion on electronic format for responses
rights.request_tips: Submit requests electronically for faster delivery and documentation

validation_metadata.notes: All rights extracted from verified jurisdiction-data.json file. West Virginia has exceptionally strong requester protections including: (1) absolute prohibition on search fees (unique), (2) 5 business day response deadline (very fast), (3) public FOIA database (unique), (4) removal from office for willful violations, and (5) criminal penalties for records destruction.
